text: Kwathiwa kuye: “Ngena ebhotwe.” Kodwa wathi akulibona (ibhotwe), wacinga ukuba lichibi lamanzi wazinyusa iilokwe zakhe (ukuze awele). Wathi (uSulaymân): “Eneneni (wena) libhotwe eli (elimgangatho walo) wenziwe ngegilasi.” Wathi yena: “Nkosi yam, inene mna ndizonile yaye ndiyazinikela noSulaymân kuAllâh, iNkosi yamaphakade.”
